name: Kiss of Beth
description:
“Kiss of Beth” is a piece of short interactive fiction, in which you have a conversation and then make a choice. It was written in Twine 2, using the Sugarcube format. It was created as an entry to the first Indie Horror Jam, run in July of 2021.

This game contains adult language, descriptions of violence, and brief references to addiction.

It works properly when run in Chrome and Safari. It may not work properly if run in Firefox. I recommend playing it fullscreen, with headphones in.

“Kiss of Beth” has two endings. It takes about 15 minutes to complete once through.
